p: Mice were bred and maintained according to the French Ministry of Agriculture and European institutional guidelines (appendix A STE n°123). Animals were killed by cervical dislocation. Experiments were performed according to national regulations of the French Ministry of Agriculture and was specifically approved (ID approval N° 34118) by the regional ethics committee of Languedoc-Roussillon (Comité Régional d’Ethique sur l’Expérimentation Animale- Languedoc-Roussillon), France.
